mapper.select: SELECT foodId, foodName, category, description, imagePath FROM food

SELECT f.foodName FROM food f JOIN twenty_attribute t ON f.foodId = t.foodId WHERE 1=1
AND f.category = 'Korean food' AND f.category != 'Korean food'
AND f.category = 'Western food' AND f.category != 'Western food'
AND f.category = 'Chinese food' AND f.category != 'Chinese food'
AND f.category = 'Japanese food' AND f.category != 'Japanese food'
AND f.category = 'Asian food' AND f.category != 'Asian food'
AND t.is_soup = #{is_soup} AND t.is_spicy = #{is_spicy} AND t.is_fried = #{is_fried} AND t.is_roasted = #{is_roasted} AND t.has_pork = #{has_pork} AND t.has_beef = #{has_beef}
